welcome_message_body: Welcome to Qalyub, Egypt! Known for its rich history and charming atmosphere, we invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer. Whether it's the ancient ruins or bustling markets, we hope you have a wonderful time here.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Used for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Newly built terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sphinx International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Sphinx International Airport, used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
